name: Abhishaike Mahajan
bio: Abhishaike Mahajan is a sophomore studying Cognitive Science, with concentrations in AI and Neuroscience, and is a part of the Collegium V Honors program. He is a research assistant in Dr.Kilgard's Neural Engineering lab Past the sciences, he is heavily invovled in writing culture, being a staff editor on one magazine, a previous staff writer on another, and the recipient of several publications/national writing awards. He is very active on Quora and Facebook
